headline: What Killed a $20 Billion Grocery Deal? Albertsons Says Kroger Did
summary: In an unsealed complaint, Albertsons claims that Kroger’s hubris and reluctance to divest of stores sank their merger; Kroger has said its rival breached the agreement.

raw.headline: What Killed a $20 Billion Grocery Deal? Albertsons Says Kroger Did
raw.summary: In an unsealed complaint, Albertsons claims that Kroger’s hubris and reluctance to divest of stores sank their merger; Kroger has said its rival breached the agreement.

headline: Union coalition calls for Kroger CEO’s removal amid buyback controversy
summary: Kroger has shifted strategy with $7.5bn stock buyback after Albertsons merger setback.

raw.headline: Union coalition calls for Kroger CEO’s removal amid buyback controversy

headline: Smithfield Foods Provides 2,000 Free Holiday Hams to Virginia and North Carolina Families in Need
summary: SMITHFIELD, Va-- Smithfield Foods distributed 2,000 free Smithfield Hickory Smoked Spiral Sliced Hams to neighbors facing hunger in Southeastern Virginia and Southeastern North Carolina this holiday...
